statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_resource_planning;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM healthcare_resource_planning WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM healthcare_resource_planning ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, discharge_date FROM healthcare_resource_planning WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM healthcare_resource_planning WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resource_planning ORDER BY admission_date DESC, discharge_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_resource_planning WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY admission_date ASC
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM healthcare_resource_planning GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resource_planning WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY admission_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM healthcare_resource_planning WHERE MONTH(admission_date) = 6 AND YEAR(admission_date) = 2022 ORDER BY admission_date ASC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, billing_amount FROM healthcare_data WHERE patient_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM resource_planning ORDER BY project_start_date ASC;
SELECT resource_type, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM resource_planning WHERE resource_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM healthcare_data WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM healthcare_data WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data JOIN resource_planning ON healthcare_data.patient_id = resource_planning.resource_id;
SELECT MAX(billing_amount) AS max_billing FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_administrators;
SELECT administrator_name, department_id, hire_date FROM healthcare_administrators;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'medical equipment';
SELECT hospital_id, forecast_demand, forecast_accuracy FROM healthcare_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_forecast WHERE hospital_id = 123 AND forecast_accuracy > 90;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_administrators ORDER BY administrator_name DESC, hire_date ASC
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'equipment' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_update DESC

SELECT administrator_name, hospital_id, department_id FROM healthcare_administrators JOIN healthcare_forecast ON healthcare_administrators.hospital_id = healthcare_forecast.hospital_id AND healthcare_administrators.department_id = 1
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources WHERE last_update >= '2022-01-01' AND quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, last_update ASC
SELECT administrator_id, administrator_name, hire_date FROM healthcare_administrators WHERE hospital_id = 1 ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM HealthServices WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital'
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM HealthServices WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_category DESC

SELECT patient_name, provider_name, service_name FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN HealthcareProviders h ON a.provider_id = h.provider_id JOIN HealthServices s ON a.service_id = s.service_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, location, contact_number FROM Hospitals WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years >= 10 ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, dob, address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON d.doctor_id = mr.doctor_id WHERE d.specialty = 'Cardiology';
